name: CosMIX - An outer space bartending sim
name_original: CosMIX - An outer space bartending sim
description:
[Please note that due to a mistake in the projects file structure the final day is broken and instead erroneously loops day 3. This will be corrected as soon as possible.]

The Moonshot bar is open for business!

Play as the new employee in an outer space bar, serving up drinks like the "Blood Moon" and "Shooting Star" to a cast of weird and wonderful original characters. Loosely inspired by VA-11 HALL-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action and our "love for space and drinks" (Franco 2020), experience the 5000+ word script and earn your Space Bartending Licence!

This project was made in 5 days entirely in Paint and Unity for the itch.io Game Off 2020. Please note there may be a few bugs or errors we haven't found yet so if you come across one let us know in the comments! 

The game is played entirely with the mouse, but there are some quick controls you may want to use:

  • Tab - Recipe Book 
  • S - Drinks Shaker
  • Enter - Serve Drink
  • Escape - Back

(Please also note we did not have time to implement a save function so if you close the game you will have to start again)
